short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check on your favorite resort every time you open a new tab. See weather conditions, lift statuses, recent tweets, and live webcams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check in on your favorite Snow Sports Resort!

This dashboard will launch from a new tab, and gives you a glimpse at the current conditions of your regular mountain.
Check the weather conditions, see which lifts are open, and check the live webcams.
